channel.title: Site Updated
channel.description: Well, I have finally completed my site update. It is now using stylesheets for layout instead of tables. I'm also using Blogger to publish to the site. Hopefully this will mean that the site get's updated with content more often......
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Martin+00:00
item.description: I've actually just moved to moveable type which I'm finding a lot more flexible. Will have a bit of a re-design and we will see.
item.dc:creator: Martin
